oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The page is folded into two: The left side contains Arabic scribbles, questions and answers such as "who was the founder of the Kingdom of Babel - Nimrod". The right side contains mainly Hebrew scribbles, Friday is mentioned at the top-right side; a greeting or a blessing addressed to a certain Hakham; two Arabic words are scribbled on the right side, and an addition in Arabic numerals of 30 and 97 equals 127.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Arabic and Hebrew jottings
